citations.narrative:
The primary enclosure for the bobcat had a dead squirrel in it. The dead squirrel was infested with maggots.
Remove dead animal carcasses from primary enclosures prior to infestation and contamination of the carcass to prevent
odor and disease hazards.
Provision shall be made for the removal and disposal of animal and food wastes, bedding, dead animals, trash and
debris.
Corrected at time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with wildlife manager.
n

narrative:
3.125(d) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The primary enclosure for the bobcat had a dead squirrel in it. The dead squirrel was infested with maggots.  
Remove dead animal carcasses from primary enclosures prior to infestation and contamination of the carcass to prevent 
odor and disease hazards. 
Provision shall be made for the removal and disposal of animal and food wastes, bedding, dead animals, trash and 
debris. 
Corrected at time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with wildlife manager. 
 
 n
